website_summaries.verdict: Not a lot of fancy features; a bare-bones package designed for medium-size jobs.
pros: Portable, stable product from a reputable company
cons: Shorter cord and lower horsepower than some competitors

customer_reviews.title: As you add attachments the suction weakens
customer_reviews.text: Always had a craftsman shop vac around the house since childhood- I remember the suction being more powerful- this one did its job, I had new decking installed and needed to get the excess sand, however I noticed as attachments were added the suction got weaker.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: WORST SHOP VAC EVER
customer_reviews.text: This will literally not suck up anything, straw or small pieces. This is absolutely junk. I just wasted my money which I don't have alot of. I have had shop Vacs in the past and they worked just fine. Not this one. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M. Hall

customer_reviews.title: what the quality of the item is.
customer_reviews.text: I didnt know craftsman made such cheap items as this vacuum is. If I had any idea how poorly constucted it was I would never have ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: marvin L. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Bad suction, stuff hose and cheap emplments. Very disappointed...and Craftsman should be too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Whitehurst

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry I had to return the product. It was impossible for me to install the casters. The casters' stems were too large for the intended installation slots! I even offered Amazon if I could buy replacement casters from providers, e.g., Home Depot, if the company reimburses me for the cost. I did not find suitable replacements, so I returned the product. I am an adept do-it-yourself person and I was not able install the casters. I requested Amazon if I could buy an equivalent product of a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio R. de Vera

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Suck as good as it used to.. lol
customer_reviews.text: Got this vacuum to replace my 20 year old (exact same CRAFTSMAN 6 gallon 3.5 Hp) vacuum. The new one doesn't seem to "suck" as powerful as the old one. Works better without to dust bag attached. The new design cord wrap is great. I new hose is stiff and awkward to move around. I tossed it and am using my old hose. Great wet/dry vacuum's from Craftsman. This 6 gallon 3.5 Hp is plenty powerful enough and portable for most household use.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a shop-vac for 50 years and finally bought one. This on came unassembled, which surprised me. I had to hammer on the wheels to get them to go all the way in. - The hose is really stiff. The wheels get caught on the cord, so the Maneuverability is affected. - I don't know if the bag must be removed or not when I use it as a blower, so I removed it. That was a hassle from my wheelchair. - Some of the accessory holders do not hold tightly. - The muffler I purchased separately is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for a shop vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this when I needed to clean up after some DIY projects around the house and to vacuum out my car and it’s done an amazing job and sucking the dirt, dust, and larger pieces of debris. It’s pretty loud, but I’ve never heard a shop vac that is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: LOUD AS HELL but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: My old shopvac smelled like gasoline because when we bought it 20 years ago we had it suck up some gas soaked sawdust (dumb for SO many reasons). Couldn't use it inside because of the stench, so doing a home improvement project this time, I decided to go for it and buy a new one. Great decision. This one is stronger, though LOUDER, and does a more thorough job than the 3HP thing I had before. And it doesn't stink up the place like gasoline. :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without my Craftsman vac!
customer_reviews.text: Ok this thing REALLY SUCKS IN A GREAT WAY LIKE IT SHOULD! Great for car, garage, and BEST THING EVER to unclog a drain! That's right! Better buy an extra filter or two to keep on hand. Clean out the vac often and wash the filter and trade out for a clean dry one to prevent a deadly smell inside. Filters are available on Amazon as well. This makes a GREAT housewarming gift and once you've had one around you'll soon wonder how you made it without one!!
customer_reviews.author: Will E. W.

customer_reviews.title: Compact but powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Craftsman vac that I've owned and it is as good as the first one. The only reason I bought this one is because I moved a year ago and we down-sized. It was one of the items I gave to a builder and its still going. I had it for 7+ years. This new model is just the right size- my old one was very big. It doesn't take up a lot of storage space and has already been used several times. Great for small size jobs.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ease of maneuverability
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a craftsman wet dry vac for years and years. When my old one finally went out I bought the next size down. I love this one even more! The only two things I don’t like about it or, the cord is too short necessitating an Extension cord, and it makes a high-pitched sound while vacuuming. But I love it more than the Dyson vacuum my kids bought me for Christmas a couple years ago. But I will never tell them that!
customer_reviews.author: fawn

customer_reviews.title: I rarely write a review but just had to on this.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a retired aircraft maintenance tech and have for over 40 years been a Craftsmen tool fan but no more. Yeah it just a shop vac but Craftsman you really outdone yourself on this. the vac is just a terrible heap of low grade cheap plastic, hoses that don't fit well. It falls apart when picked up by the handle. The vac has to be the noisiest thing since the eruption of Mt St Helen, The vac is just a bulky piece of CRP, I should have gone to lowes and looked around.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sucks! That's Good!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum sucks! That's Good! Vacuums are supposed to suck! I should be a comedian....anyway...... Maybe this is a plus, but this is much bigger than I imagined. I didn't realize how many attachments it would have. So far we've clean out the car with it. It's really good. I think I might actually have chosen a smaller model if I had realized. But if you want an outdoor vacuum that does really well, choose one like this!
customer_reviews.author: Silas

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to maneuver around but we have used it so much for both wet and dry vacuuming incidents. It is pretty heavy when it has water in it but guess that is true of any of them. It has really good suction capability. The hose is awkward to handle. Over all, a good product and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Not such a great buy
customer_reviews.text: The suction power on this vac well sucks but doesn't really suck that great. And the hoses are smaller which means it can't pickup as large scraps, crumbs, stuff, whatever... I wold return if I didn't already throw out my old one and the box it came with
customer_reviews.author: reidster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for indoor and garage use
customer_reviews.text: I am a retired woman with a disabled husband and find Craftsman to be just right for my indoor cobweb needs as well as cleaning up the garage. I would only add a longer cord to this product. However, it was easy enough to purchase an extension cord to give me a longer range.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G

customer_reviews.title: Makes Christmas Tree Clean-up a Breeze!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lifesaver, I wish I would have bought one years ago! We use it out on our lanai, in our garage and just used it yesterday to vacuum up needles from the Christmas tree so we don’t clog our good indoor vacuum this year. This is a good one, I’ve gotten several comments from various guys doing odd jobs for us that they want one too!
customer_reviews.author: Claude Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product!!!! It has no suction power. It will not pick up nuts, bolts, dirt and especially water. It will barely pick up dog hair. I am in the process now of trying to contact the vendor for a full refund for this piece of junk. I used to think Craftsman was a good company that makes good equipment but no longer. This shop vac deserves negative stars but I can only give it an one star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Gaffa

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SHOP VAC!
customer_reviews.text: Our 30 year old Kenmore died after someone used it with no filter and we ended up purchasing an inferior model from Home Depot. Sears is gone and I thought I would not be able to get another Kenmore! So happy that I could purchase this from Amazon. It came quickly, I actually upgraded the model and am so happy to have!
customer_reviews.author: mkm

customer_reviews.title: Great product. As described.
customer_reviews.text: Great product from craftsman and it's hp it's a smaller one so yes the suction isn't as good as the more expensive ones but it works great and I have no complaints. I see people and there reviews and for how much this is and the hp it has, that's what you get so buy something more expensive if you want more suction. I'm perfectly happy with the shop vac no complaints. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I think people in the reviews says that theirs no suction are not putting the lid on the correct way it may see like it fits but it only seals up 1 way
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Snap wheels in firmly
customer_reviews.text: Suction good, hose long enough except for inside auto. I would get extension if I had to do over. The wheels need to be pressed in until a definite snap is heard. They are a little hard to get in but I feel more comfortable with that than the possibility of them fall out later.
customer_reviews.author: beauchamp43

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shop vac for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect shop vac for everyday use. Cleaning up the garage, cat litter area, work bench. Pickup wet and dry dirt with ease. Used it for picking leavea during the fall season and the unit worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Pranav Garg

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I would have just splurged and got a bigger one. The suck function doesn’t work that great with small partials. It escapes the vents and just puts more dirt out there. Also no drain! So if you suck up water you need to empty by dumping and cleaning and then dry with a towel. It was not a good buy for our family. It moves bulky too.
customer_reviews.author: HGDW

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction
customer_reviews.text: Great vac, easy to use for wet or dry messes!
customer_reviews.author: Druthb

customer_reviews.title: Wheels do not insert into body of vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get very far once I discovered that the wheels would NOT insert into the body. The wholes appeared too small and there was no give to the hard plastic to allow the shaft of the wheels to be inserted. Once that happened, I packed up the whole thing and returned it for a refund. Being a Craftsman product, I expected a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Deb S.

customer_reviews.title: Would work much better if it had a gasket
customer_reviews.text: The suction is okay, but if it had a gasket between the top and the canister, it would work much better. You have to move it around until the plastic meets the plastic better. Come on. A $2 gasket would make all the difference in the world for suction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman's Quality Control Non-Existent
customer_reviews.text: The hardware necessary to attach the handle to the top of the shop vac is missing. Obviously nobody at Craftsman checked to make sure that everything was included in the box. This is very unprofessional hence my rating.
customer_reviews.author: CT06897

customer_reviews.title: Poor wheels, Great Vac
customer_reviews.text: The wheels pop right out, so it makes it difficult to move the vacuum. If it gets caught on something and tips in any small way, the wheels fall out and now your scraping it across the garage (we use in the garage and for our vehicles). If you pick it up to carry, the wheels also pop out. Other than the wheel problem, it’s pretty good quality. We just keep the wheels out and carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: dallas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work like it should
customer_reviews.text: I received this and after assembling, and yes, following the directions to put it together. The vac will not suck at all, it only blows. Do not buy this product, it is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Clariss

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super cool, but it didn't come with any of the hose clips. A few missing things, but overall a nice vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this vacuum to suck up leaves and debris around the yard. It does an excellent job, but it is difficult to avoid sucking up small rocks that are part of the décor.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Collard

customer_reviews.title: Good vac, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light, but sturdy feel to it and no fidgeting with the latches needed like the cheap ones do. Used it on a few projects and very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Collins

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend craftsman shop vac
customer_reviews.text: Craftsman shop vac work like a champ, I removed 300lbs of sand from my pool filter with no problems and the suction was very powerful and does what it was designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Del

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice!
customer_reviews.text: This product stands on its word. It sucks well and I am happy with this purchase. It was a gift and the recipient loves it. They wanted a Shopvac but they are glad I bought them a Craftsman!
customer_reviews.author: Mica, R.

customer_reviews.title: Not my type of shop vac
customer_reviews.text: Screws missing. I didn’t like how it locks, lack of brush part and it was sorta weird. It wasn’t the one I looked for so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I never owned a Wet/Dry Vac before. This one worked great. I wasn’t sure how to use it but it was really easy to put together and use. I’m an old woman and just needed a little help from my husband to push the wheels into place.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. We use it as a vacuum and also as a leaf blower for our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Barbiss

customer_reviews.title: No good suction
customer_reviews.text: The suction on it is horrible. The shorter the hose the better. But I can’t even use it and add attachments because it just doesn’t pick up! Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Sent me junk
customer_reviews.text: The vacumn shut off and wont turn back, I just bought it....in June this year, junk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I expected but it works well. Size makes the maneuverability better and it is light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good for light puckups
customer_reviews.text: Supplied bag seems to be a deterrent. Shop vac not too powerful.
customer_reviews.author: edward fulke

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the full size every day car shop quality vacuum it appears to be. Good little vacuum for the money but not very strong and built kind of flimsy. Overall ok buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and performance
customer_reviews.text: Never had a shop vac before. Needed something for a tough plumbing mishap and this thing killed it!
customer_reviews.author: rick8671

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible shop vac. Struggles to pick up the slightest debris. Disappointed I didn’t really use it until outside the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Suction of this is horrible. Being as loud as it is, you'd think it was stronger but NO. My HOUSE VACUUM has a stronger suction than this and I only paid $30 for it at a grocery store (not even name Brand might I add). Wound up having to pull the house vacuum out instead. Even the liquid suction of this is sub-par at best. COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend to anyone nor purchase again. If I had kept the box I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use. Not the quality of the 12 gal that I had for many years. Not enough attachments and they do not stay in place on the canister where they are to be stored. The hose is very short and pulls the canister even before it uncurls. I am sorely disappointed with this item and think the quality has gone down and the cost has increased.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where the negative comments on this came from. Very powerful and great in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Catoe

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like was it did not have a crevice tool or a hose retainer when you roll up the hose
customer_reviews.author: 02 Bagger

customer_reviews.title: Need ear plugs when turned on!
customer_reviews.text: A total disappointment . Cheaply made & you need a set of ear plugs to wear when you turn it on. Didn’t expect this from what the description says
customer_reviews.author: MCT

customer_reviews.title: So so love this
customer_reviews.text: Now this has suction. Great buy for the money with all the extra tools
customer_reviews.author: RORYN R ELY

customer_reviews.title: Check Your Parts before you start to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The screws were missing from my wet/dry vac pack up. I was very surprised, because I settled on the Craftsman wet/dry vac because of previous great quality. It is a big deal for me because I do not have a tool box with screws just laying around. Now my handle is rickety. Otherwise set up was simple
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good vac
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sucking power, however the hose could be a little longer
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and not enough attachment
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed. Do script and price I find local Lowe’s have half of price
customer_reviews.author: fujimatt

customer_reviews.title: grat purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome deal and it worked out Just right. Would do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product just clean up the mess before sending it to a buyer.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but opened the package and didn’t realize not only was the hose full of dirt and wood chips I spilled it all over my carpet. The vacuum was full of the same stuff. Seller didn’t even attempt to clean it up before poorly putting it into a box. Packaging was not great either.
customer_reviews.author: Angela & Roxie

customer_reviews.title: OK but not as good as my old one.
customer_reviews.text: I had the same one except about ten years old. The thing I really don't like about this one is the filter and the way it attaches. Not going to las five years if your lucky. Snaps in rubber to rubber meanwhile what ever is in the filter gets all over you while your trying to get it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing has terrible suction. Do not purchase. Spend a few extra bucks and get a larger/stronger one.
customer_reviews.author: HopeFaithnpRay

customer_reviews.title: Only good for lightweight jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Not much suction power with this vacuum. I replaced a 4.25 HP vacuum with this one and wish I hadn't. This barely picks up the leaves in my yard. Very disappointed. Should return, but pitched the box.
customer_reviews.author: Carolee Martin

customer_reviews.title: Look around first
customer_reviews.text: Ace hardware store actually had it way cheaper and the suction was not that great
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Craftsman wet/dry vacuum
customer_reviews.text: The Craftsman wet dry vacuum is powerful and lightweight, easy to maneuver and can be used with or without a bag. Great for inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Varcoe

customer_reviews.title: All around great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product we purchased this to help clean our rat cages works like a charm. Less mess. Cleans cage in minutes. Amazing suction.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and easy of use
customer_reviews.text: It really vacuumed up the water that comes in on our back porch quickly and easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but bulky
customer_reviews.text: Love this, however the hose wasn't good. It kept kinking on me and it likes to tip over.
customer_reviews.author: LaceyFamily12

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum did not have hardly any suction. It was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Becbec

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Had my old one for 35 years. I hope this one lasts that long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud Loud Loud
customer_reviews.text: I have to actually wear earbuds when using, I don't want to get hearing loss. Also the hose is extremely stiff and the end attachment is very small. Takes way to long to vacuum my house. Have had much better luck with shop vacs.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine it's my first and I hope it last forever. Great suction cleans up anything
customer_reviews.author: flo

customer_reviews.title: You might not be able to use it (missing parts)
customer_reviews.text: I was missing like 4 screws and 2 parts. Cant even put it together to use it :( sad face
customer_reviews.author: Blargh

customer_reviews.title: Came without hose and can’t return
customer_reviews.text: This product came without hose since I didn’t need it until now I did not know and now amazon is telling me I’m past my return date.
customer_reviews.author: hooray4dogs

customer_reviews.title: Broken parts, but still works
customer_reviews.text: It came and was already broken in a spot. Then in less than a year of having it another part broke. I'm too lazy to send anything to get a refund because the vacuum still works. Just check your stuff right away when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Suction
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light weight, however suction power is just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: St. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed ☹️ this is nothing like the other one I have suctions isn’t powerful and I should have returned it but didn’t take it out of box for quite a while and after putting it together was totally disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Patrica C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this twice, but it was very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Diana L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Some of the parts were missing to put it together (all the screws to attach the wheels), so we assembled as best we could and tried to drag it around. It has no sucking power. At all. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I have been needing
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for all I need it for! Right size, right power and works awesom!
customer_reviews.author: BryanB

customer_reviews.title: Quality poor
customer_reviews.text: Does not have good suction. Says its a craftsman but it is not near as durable nor built like the craftsman I have. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Todd J Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Wet dry vac
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Suction pretty good on water in basement and dry vacuum as well. Great deal to use just about anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Diniz

customer_reviews.title: The wheels fall off
customer_reviews.text: The caster ball is supposed to click into place. It doesn't. Wheels are not absolutely necessary, but, they are included and should works as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wheels didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: the wheels didn't snap into place like the directions said so i have to drag it around, that makes it real hard to move around. very disappointed in craftsmen brand.
customer_reviews.author: tim pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for husband. He first said i got one already. When used it for remodeling he said much better than his old one that was big and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Barcikowski

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: Unit top has to be perfectly lined up. Not something I would expect from a craftsman tool! dust BAG LEAVES NO SUCTION TO SPEAK OF DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shop vac
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good shop vac with a lot of suction.
customer_reviews.author: charles stimpson

customer_reviews.title: Suction not as strong as I hope, but couldn’t complain with price
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but suction wasn’t as good as I’d like but then again I didn’t spend a lot. If I wanted better suction I should have spent more money
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: It was decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The hose and attachments are a little clunky and difficult to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum is light weight and easy to maneuver. Suction is powerful.
customer_reviews.author: elliana

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This item has zero suction while using the hose and floor attachment. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Drexler

customer_reviews.title: I can’t clean the filter if I can’t remove it.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get the plastic nut off that holds the filer on
customer_reviews.author: Terry Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller
customer_reviews.text: Much better vacuum than others in same price range. Built like Craftsman shop vacs from 40 years ago, with many improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight P. Minnich

product_meta.title: CRAFTSMAN CMXEVBE17590 9 Gallon 4.25 Peak HP Wet/Dry Vac, Portable Shop Vacuum with Attachments
product_meta.description: Size:9 gallon 4.25 Peak HpThe CRAFTSMAN 9 Gallon Wet/Dry Vac, featuring a 4. 25 peak HP motor, is great for home renovations or home emergencies. Equipped with one of the most powerful motors our compact vacs have to offer, the 9-gallon shop vacuum is great for general garage cleaning, basement cleanup from flooding or seepage, as well as, removing water from clogged sinks. With an extra-large drain, liquids can be emptied quickly and easily from the tank. The Qwik Lock Filter Fastening System allows for quick and easy wet dry vacuum filter changes. Store this wet dry vac with ease. On-board hose storage, plus accessory and power cord organizers help eliminate unneeded hassle and reduce overall storage space.
feature_bullets: VERSATILE: Ideal for medium-sized jobs around the garage, home, renovations, and jobsite
BLOWER PORT: Use the rear exhaust port on this shop vacuum for blowing debris out of your garage or from your driveway and sidewalk
OVERSIZED DRAIN: Built-in oversized drain on the wet/dry vac allows for convenient emptying of liquids

EASY FILTER REPLACEMENT: Qwik Lock Filter Fastening System allows quick and easy wet dry vacuum filter changes. Do not leave Vac running while unattended - you may fail to notice important signs indicating abnormal operation such as loss of suction, debris/liquid exiting the exhaust, or abnormal motor noises. Immediately stop using Vac if you notice these signs
ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: 1-7/8 in. x 7 ft. Pos-I-Lock Hose, 2 Locking Extension Wands, Utility Nozzle, Car Nozzle, Wet Nozzle, Qwik Lock Filter and Dust Collection Bag

specifications.Included Components: Includes: Wet/Dry Vac, 1-7/8” x 7’ Pos-I-Lock® Hose, 2 Locking Extension Wands, Utility Nozzle, Car Nozzle, Wet Nozzle, Qwik Lock® Pleated Paper Filter, Dust Collection Bag
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars574 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
